short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all "You" with "Chu ðŸ’—" and by doing so it makes your browsing 1000% cuter!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
there isn't much to say here, it just replaces all the "You" with "Chu ðŸ’—"...

press the Enter key or the ALT key to run the code again replacing all newly added yous (content that is added via content updates, like AJAX requests).

Known issues:
 - it wont work automatically on newly added content (content that is added via content updates, like AJAX requests).
 - it might not work on all "you"s at times.
